price: [Allah said], “O John, hold the Scripture with all your strength.” And We gave him wisdom when he was still a child,
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
